pages.text: <li>connects to <l>(transport/pipe)pressure</l> or normal pipes<li>if a fluid is piped in that can be placed in the world, the block in front is Air and at least a bucket has been piped in a source block will be placed<li>if liquid XP or mob essence is piped in it will will produce XP orbs instead<li>any extra fluid is instantly destroyed<li>can be <l>(transport/filtering)filtered</l>
